entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
